title: Discuss amongst yourselves
author: VD
content_html:
There’s a change coming in the next day or so that should please a few of you. The idea is to replace Haloscan with a sophisticated commenting system that will have a few features that I suggested. However, this may mean that your comments during the transition period will be lost, so try not to say anything too terribly profound. The previous 304,000 comments will be preserved; not only that, they’ll be searchable and trackable and all kinds of keen stuff. It should also facilitate the Thucydides discussions.

By the way, this was posted with Blogger’s new scheduled publishing feature, which Blogger has finally gotten around to adding. If you’re on Blogger, note that for the time being, you need to be logged in to draft.blogger.com to use it.
